content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM is a company where every employee can realize his/her potential from a professional and career perspective. Stay up-to-date with the latest news in the sphere of corporate learning — make use of the \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"http://epmsp002/Training/\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Training Portal \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"(please use VPN or company network to access) capacities.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"By the way, you can find out about Global Competence Framework \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://info.epam.com/gcf.html\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"here\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If you have any questions regarding this section, please address them to \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"mailto:WFAHumanResourceHungary@epam.com\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"WFA Human Resource Hungary\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\", \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"mailto:WFACareerDevelopmentHU@epam.com\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"WFA Career Development HU\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" or your Manager, RTL. \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\n\\n\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
